mapper.select: SELECT '0' AS CHK /*CHK*/ , A.CMMN_CD /*공통코드*/ , A.CMMN_DETA_CD /*공통상세코드*/ , A.CMMN_DETA_CD_NM /*공통상세코드명*/ , A.CMMN_DETA_CD_ABBNM /*공통상세코드약명*/ , B.LANG_FG_CD /*언어구분코드*/ , B.LANG_FG_NM /*언어코드명*/ , B.LANG_ABBNM /*언어코드약명*/ , B.USE_YN /*사용여부*/ , B.REMK_CTNT /*비고내역*/ , B.FRST_INPUT_ID /*최초입력자ID*/ , B.FRST_INPUT_DT /*최초입력일시*/ , B.FRST_INPUT_MENU_ID /*최초입력메뉴ID*/ , B.FRST_INPUT_IP /*최초입력IP*/ , B.LAST_MODF_ID /*최종수정입력ID*/ , B.LAST_MODF_DT /*최종수정일시*/ , B.LAST_MODF_MENU_ID /*최종수정메뉴ID*/ , B.LAST_MODF_IP /*최종수정IP*/ FROM COM.CSYS110 A LEFT JOIN COM.CSYS111 B ON A.CMMN_CD =B.CMMN_CD AND A.CMMN_DETA_CD = B.CMMN_DETA_CD WHERE A.CMMN_CD = #{CMMN_CD} /* CsyscdDAO.retrieveCommCodeDetailList 상세코드 조회 */

SELECT A.CMMN_CD ,A.CMMN_GRP_CD ,A.CMMN_GRP_CD_NM ,A.ADD_ATT_VAL ,A.REMK_WPC ,B.ADD_ATT_VAL ,B.SORT_SEQ ,B.USE_YN ,B.REMK_WPC ,B.FRST_INPUT_ID ,B.FRST_INPUT_DT ,B.FRST_INPUT_MENU_ID ,B.FRST_INPUT_IP ,B.LAST_MODF_ID ,B.LAST_MODF_DT ,B.LAST_MODF_MENU_ID ,B.LAST_MODF_IP FROM COM.CSYS120 A LEFT JOIN COM.CSYS121 B ON A.CMMN_CD = B.CMMN_CD AND A.CMMN_GRP_CD = B.CMMN_GRP_CD /*CsyscdDAO.retrieveCommCodeGropList 코드 그룹 조회 */
mapper.update:
UPDATE COM.CSYS100 SET CMMN_CD_NM = #{CMMN_CD_NM} /*공통코드명*/ , USE_YN = #{USE_YN} /*사용여부*/ , REMK_CTNT = #{REMK_CTNT} /*비고내역*/ , BF_CMMN_CD = #{BF_CMMN_CD} /*이전공통코드*/ , FRST_INPUT_ID = #{FRST_INPUT_ID} /*등록자*/ , FRST_INPUT_DT = SYSDATE /*등록일시*/ , LAST_MODF_ID = #{LAST_MODF_ID} /*수정자*/ , LAST_MODF_DT = SYSDATE /*수정일시*/ WHERE 1=1 AND CMMN_CD = #{CMMN_CD}
/* CsyscdDAO.updateCommCodeMasterList 공통코드 수정 */
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM COM.CSYS110 WHERE 1=1 AND CMMN_DETA_CD NOT IN (SELECT CMMN_DETA_CD FROM COM.CSYS111 GROUP BY CMMN_DETA_CD)
/* CsyscdDAO.deleteEmptyCodeDetailList 언어코드가 없는 상세코드 삭제 */
mapper.select: SELECT '0' as CHK, A.DEPT_CD, A.UP_DEPT_CD, A.DEPT_GRP_FG_CD, A.DEPT_TYP_CD, A.UNIV_CD, A.SUST_CD, A.DEPT_NM, A.DEPT_ABBNM, A.SHAF_FORMA_YN, A.DAN_FG, A.FR_DT, A.ABLN_DT, A.ABLN_EXPC_DT, A.PRN_ORD, A.CYBER_FORMA_YN, A.USE_YN, A.FL_DEPT_YN, A.REMK, A.CAMP_FG_CD, A.FRST_INPUT_ID, A.FRST_INPUT_DT, A.FRST_INPUT_MENU_ID, A.FRST_INPUT_IP, A.LAST_MODF_ID, A.LAST_MODF_DT, A.LAST_MODF_MENU_ID, A.LAST_MODF_IP, BREU_FG, A.FORMA_TYP, A.DEPT_ENG_NM, A.DEPT_ENG_ABB_NM, A.DEPT_CHN_NM, A.DEPT_CHN_ABB_NM, A.DEPT_ID, A.COLG_NM, A.SUST_TEAM_NM, A.CERT_DEPT_NM, A.DAYTM_SUST_CD, A.INFO_ANNC_PART, A.SHAF_DEGR, A.MASTER_DEGR, A.PHD_DEGR, MJ_CLSF, A.CONN_MJ, ACHV_PART, A.REG_PART, A.GRDT_DEGR_IDCD_PRN_NM, A.LSN_YR, A.ACHV_SCRN_UNIV, A.GRSC_CLSF, A.SUST_NM, A.GW_DEPT_CONN_YN, A.SPRF_GW_DEPT_CD, A.EMP_GW_DEPT_CD, A.DEPT_SORT_SEQ, A.SUB_CHANC_MISS_CD FROM COM.CSYS300 A ORDER BY DEPT_CD
SELECT '0' as CHK, A.BF_DEPT_CD, A.AF_DEPT_CD, A.REMK FROM COM.CSYS311 A ORDER BY FRST_INPUT_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM.CSYS300 A( A.DEPT_CD, A.UP_DEPT_CD, A.DEPT_GRP_FG_CD, A.DEPT_TYP_CD, A.UNIV_CD, A.SUST_CD, A.DEPT_NM, A.DEPT_ABBNM, A.SHAF_FORMA_YN, A.DAN_FG, A.FR_DT, A.ABLN_DT, A.ABLN_EXPC_DT, A.PRN_ORD, A.CYBER_FORMA_YN, A.USE_YN, A.FL_DEPT_YN, A.REMK, A.CAMP_FG_CD, A.FRST_INPUT_ID, A.FRST_INPUT_DT, A.BREU_FG, A.FORMA_TYP, A.DEPT_ENG_NM, A.DEPT_ENG_ABB_NM, A.DEPT_CHN_NM, A.DEPT_CHN_ABB_NM, A.DEPT_ID, A.COLG_NM, A.SUST_TEAM_NM, A.CERT_DEPT_NM, A.DAYTM_SUST_CD, A.INFO_ANNC_PART, A.SHAF_DEGR, A.MASTER_DEGR, A.PHD_DEGR, A.MJ_CLSF, A.CONN_MJ, A.ACHV_PART, A.REG_PART, A.GRDT_DEGR_IDCD_PRN_NM, A.LSN_YR, A.ACHV_SCRN_UNIV, A.GRSC_CLSF, A.SUST_NM, A.GW_DEPT_CONN_YN, A.SPRF_GW_DEPT_CD, A.EMP_GW_DEPT_CD, A.DEPT_SORT_SEQ, A.SUB_CHANC_MISS_CD ) VALUES( #{DEPT_CD}, #{UP_DEPT_CD}, #{DEPT_GRP_FG_CD}, #{DEPT_TYP_CD}, #{UNIV_CD}, #{SUST_CD}, #{DEPT_NM}, #{DEPT_ABBNM}, #{SHAF_FORMA_YN}, #{DAN_FG}, #{FR_DT}, #{ABLN_DT}, #{ABLN_EXPC_DT}, #{PRN_ORD}, #{CYBER_FORMA_YN}, #{USE_YN}, #{FL_DEPT_YN}, #{REMK}, #{CAMP_FG_CD}, #{FRST_INPUT_ID}, SYSDATE, #{BREU_FG}, #{FORMA_TYP}, #{DEPT_ENG_NM}, #{DEPT_ENG_ABB_NM}, #{DEPT_CHN_NM}, #{DEPT_CHN_ABB_NM}, #{DEPT_ID}, #{COLG_NM}, #{SUST_TEAM_NM}, #{CERT_DEPT_NM}, #{DAYTM_SUST_CD}, #{INFO_ANNC_PART}, #{SHAF_DEGR}, #{MASTER_DEGR}, #{PHD_DEGR}, #{MJ_CLSF}, #{CONN_MJ}, #{ACHV_PART}, #{REG_PART}, #{GRDT_DEGR_IDCD_PRN_NM}, #{LSN_YR}, #{ACHV_SCRN_UNIV}, #{GRSC_CLSF}, #{SUST_NM}, #{GW_DEPT_CONN_YN}, #{SPRF_GW_DEPT_CD}, #{EMP_GW_DEPT_CD}, #{DEPT_SORT_SEQ}, #{SUB_CHANC_MISS_CD} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COM.CSYS300 A SET A.UP_DEPT_CD = #{UP_DEPT_CD}, A.DEPT_GRP_FG_CD=#{DEPT_GRP_FG_CD}, A.DEPT_TYP_CD=#{DEPT_TYP_CD}, A.UNIV_CD=#{UNIV_CD}, A.SUST_CD=#{SUST_CD}, A.DEPT_NM=#{DEPT_NM}, A.DEPT_ABBNM=#{DEPT_ABBNM}, A.SHAF_FORMA_YN=#{SHAF_FORMA_YN}, A.DAN_FG=#{DAN_FG}, A.FR_DT=#{FR_DT}, A.ABLN_DT=#{ABLN_DT}, A.ABLN_EXPC_DT=#{ABLN_EXPC_DT}, A.PRN_ORD=0, A.CYBER_FORMA_YN=#{CYBER_FORMA_YN}, A.USE_YN=#{USE_YN}, A.FL_DEPT_YN=#{FL_DEPT_YN}, A.REMK=#{REMK}, A.CAMP_FG_CD=#{CAMP_FG_CD}, A.FRST_INPUT_ID=#{FRST_INPUT_ID}, A.FRST_INPUT_DT=SYSDATE, A.BREU_FG=#{BREU_FG}, A.FORMA_TYP=#{FORMA_TYP}, A.DEPT_ENG_NM=#{DEPT_ENG_NM}, A.DEPT_ENG_ABB_NM=#{DEPT_ENG_ABB_NM}, A.DEPT_CHN_NM=#{DEPT_CHN_NM}, A.DEPT_CHN_ABB_NM=#{DEPT_CHN_ABB_NM}, A.DEPT_ID=#{DEPT_ID}, A.COLG_NM=#{COLG_NM}, A.SUST_TEAM_NM=#{SUST_TEAM_NM}, A.CERT_DEPT_NM=#{CERT_DEPT_NM}, A.DAYTM_SUST_CD=#{DAYTM_SUST_CD}, A.INFO_ANNC_PART=#{INFO_ANNC_PART}, A.SHAF_DEGR=#{SHAF_DEGR}, A.MASTER_DEGR=#{MASTER_DEGR}, A.PHD_DEGR=#{PHD_DEGR}, A.MJ_CLSF=#{MJ_CLSF}, A.CONN_MJ=#{CONN_MJ}, A.ACHV_PART=#{ACHV_PART}, A.REG_PART=#{REG_PART}, A.GRDT_DEGR_IDCD_PRN_NM=#{GRDT_DEGR_IDCD_PRN_NM}, A.LSN_YR=#{LSN_YR}, A.ACHV_SCRN_UNIV=#{ACHV_SCRN_UNIV}, A.GRSC_CLSF=#{GRSC_CLSF}, A.SUST_NM=#{SUST_NM}, A.GW_DEPT_CONN_YN=#{GW_DEPT_CONN_YN}, A.SPRF_GW_DEPT_CD=#{SPRF_GW_DEPT_CD}, A.EMP_GW_DEPT_CD=#{EMP_GW_DEPT_CD}, A.DEPT_SORT_SEQ=#{DEPT_SORT_SEQ}, A.SUB_CHANC_MISS_CD=#{SUB_CHANC_MISS_CD} WHERE A.DEPT_CD=#{DEPT_CD}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COM.CSYS300 A WHERE A.DEPT_CD=#{DEPT_CD}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COM.CSYS311 A( A.BF_DEPT_CD, A.AF_DEPT_CD, A.REMK, A.FRST_INPUT_ID, A.FRST_INPUT_DT) VALUES( #{BF_DEPT_CD}, #{AF_DEPT_CD}, #{REMK}, #{FRST_INPUT_ID}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE COM.CSYS311 A SET A.REMK=#{REMK}, A.LAST_MODF_ID=#{LAST_MODF_ID}, A.LAST_MODF_DT=SYSDATE WHERE A.BF_DEPT_CD=#{BF_DEPT_CD} AND A.AF_DEPT_CD=#{AF_DEPT_CD}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COM.CSYS311 A WHERE A.BF_DEPT_CD=#{BF_DEPT_CD} AND A.AF_DEPT_CD=#{AF_DEPT_CD}
